This website gives an overview over all publicly available software packages created by members of MSS.
This website is created and managed by Methods for Model-based Development in Computational Engineering (MBD) under the supervision of Uni.-Prof. Dr. sc. habil. Julia Kowalski.
So far only software of MBD is featured.
